name: finflow-microfrontends
description: FinFlow Personal Finance Manager - Microfrontends Architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shell" "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:expenses" "npm run dev:income" "npm run dev:budget" "npm run dev:wishlist" "npm run dev:reports"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:microfrontends
scripts.build:shared: cd shared/components && npm run build && cd ../utils && npm run build && cd ../types && npm run build
scripts.build:microfrontends: concurrently "npm run build:shell" "npm run build:dashboard" "npm run build:expenses" "npm run build:income" "npm run build:budget" "npm run build:wishlist" "npm run build:reports"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:microfrontends && npm run install:shared
scripts.install:microfrontends: concurrently "cd microfrontends/shell && npm install" "cd microfrontends/dashboard && npm install" "cd microfrontends/expenses && npm install" "cd microfrontends/income && npm install" "cd microfrontends/budget && npm install" "cd microfrontends/wishlist && npm install" "cd microfrontends/reports && npm install"
scripts.install:shared: cd shared/components && npm install && cd ../utils && npm install && cd ../types && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:microfrontends && npm run clean:shared
scripts.clean:microfrontends: concurrently "cd microfrontends/shell && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd microfrontends/dashboard && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd microfrontends/expenses && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd microfrontends/income && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd microfrontends/budget && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd microfrontends/wishlist && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd microfrontends/reports && rm -rf node_modules dist"
scripts.clean:shared: cd shared/components && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../utils && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../types && rm -rf node_modules dist
scripts.lint:microfrontends: concurrently "cd microfrontends/shell && npm run lint" "cd microfrontends/dashboard && npm run lint" "cd microfrontends/expenses && npm run lint" "cd microfrontends/income && npm run lint" "cd microfrontends/budget && npm run lint" "cd microfrontends/wishlist && npm run lint" "cd microfrontends/reports && npm run lint"
scripts.test:microfrontends: concurrently "cd microfrontends/shell && npm run test" "cd microfrontends/dashboard && npm run test" "cd microfrontends/expenses && npm run test" "cd microfrontends/income && npm run test" "cd microfrontends/budget && npm run test" "cd microfrontends/wishlist && npm run test" "cd microfrontends/reports && npm run test"

author: FinFlow Team
